All Classes

Class
Description
Customer
This class contains all the information of a particular customer.
It includes name, phone number, the number of people in the group and the membership status.
FileEditor
This class reads, writes and stores data in files.
Food
This class contains all the information of a particular food.
It includes the name, price, ID and type of food.
FoodType
This documents the different types of food.
HomePage
 
MemberList
This class contains the list of members of the restaurant.
The members are identified by their phone number.
Only 1 instance can exist at all times.
MemberListControl
This class contains the functions used to control the list of members.
Menu
This class contains all the information of the menu.
MenuControl
This class contains the functions used to control the menu.
Order
This class contains all the information of a particular order.
OrderControl
This class contains the functions used to control an order.
PromoSet
This class contains all the information of a particular promotion set.
It includes the name, ID, food items and price.
Reservation
This class contains all the information of a particular reservation.
ReservationList
This class contains all the information on list of reservations in the restaurant.
Only 1 instance can exist at all times.
ReservationListControl
This class contains the functions used to control the list of reservations.
Role
This documents the different roles for staff.
SalesReport
This class contains the information of the sales report.
SalesReportControl
This class contains the functions used to control the sales report.
Staff
This class contains the information of a particular staff.
StaffList
This class contains the list of staff of the restaurant.
StaffListControl
This class contains the functions used to control the list of staffs.
Table
This class contains the information of a particular table.
It includes the table ID, maximum pax, status, customer, order of the table.
TableList
This class contains list of tables in the restaurant.
Only 1 instance can exist at all times.
TableListControl
This class contains the functions used to control the list of tables.
WriteData
